Posts.Content: IHateGoogle wrote: Hello! I'm 28 years old, married, and a mom to four kids ages 7 and under. Last week I noticed my left breast was itchy. No literally thought nothing of it and just scratched it. After a couple of days I decided to google it hoping to find some good creams to use. Instead I found link after link about IBC. I'd never even heard of it. My left breast was all red and rashy from the scratching and I have no idea if it was red before. The redness and itchiness has decreased after using cortisone cream after the last two nights. My breasts are always asymmetrical, and it is obvious in photos that one is fuller than the other. There seems to be some maybe ridging on underside. It isn't sore to touch, but both breasts have been tender. I have an appt on Tuesday Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Itchy Boob Has Lead to Panic IHateGoogle Kicks
